songs.title: Reborn
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You can only be strong for so long
Before everything just smashes
They will insult you, break you, hurt you
But they cannot destroy you

I no longer feared the darkness
Because the darkness, now fears me
The light will shine and everyone will see
From the ashes of my past
Like a phoenix, I will be

[Chorus]
Because I am standing, standing, and still standing
They will see me now as I am rising
Nothing to left, nothing to cling (oh)
I am reborn and I will keep burning

[Verse 2]
I'm tired of being desperate, sick of being alone
So I look up to the sky to try and find a home
The light will shine and everyone will see
From the ashes of my past
Like a phoenix, I will be

[Chorus]
Because I am standing, standing, and still standing
They will see me now as I am rising
Nothing to left, nothing to cling (oh)
I am reborn and I will keep burning

[Bridge]
I am a phoenix, I’ve been reborn  (oh yeah)
I am a phoenix, I've been resurrected
I am a phoenix, I've been reborn (oh yeah)
I am a phoenix, get ready to see me burn

[Chorus]
Because I am standing, standing, and still standing
They will see me now as I am rising
Nothing to left, nothing to cling (oh)
I am reborn and I will keep burning

[Post-Chorus]
I am reborn and I will keep burning
And keep burning
